Class ProfileFileReader

java.lang.Object
ProfileFileReader
public class ProfileFileReader extends Object
Class to manage profiles and their best scores.
Author:
Tomasz Fijalkowski

  • Method Details

    • loadData

      public static void loadData() throws FileNotFoundException
      Load data from text file to memory. Should be use only once at the start of the program.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - file not found

    • saveDataToFile

      public static void saveDataToFile() throws IOException
      Saves data from memory to a file. Can be used many times (but it might be use only while switching the scenes). Strongly recommended using at the end of the program (otherwise changes are lost).
      Throws:
      IOException

    • createNewProfile

      public static void createNewProfile(String profileName)
      Create new profile with chosen name.
      Parameters:
      profileName - name of a profile

    • deleteProfile

      public static void deleteProfile(String profileName)
      Delete profile from memory. If name is not in the memory then does nothing.
      Parameters:
      profileName - name of a profile

    • getBestScore

      public static int getBestScore(String profileName, String levelName)
      Return best profile score for the specified level.
      Parameters:
      profileName - name of a profile
      levelName - level which you want to safe score
      Returns:
      best player score

    • saveScore

      public static void saveScore(String profileName, String levelName, int score)
      Save score if it is new best score for specified level.
      Parameters:
      profileName - name of a profile
      levelName - level which you want to safe score
      score - score you want to safe

    • doesProfileExist

      public static boolean doesProfileExist(String profileName)
      Check if a profile exist in database.
      Parameters:
      profileName - name of a profile
      Returns:
      true if profile exist, false otherwise
